patterns.message: Prefer path aliases over relative paths in import statements.
Remove repeated slash characters in import statements.
Prefer namespaced path aliases (e.g. '#lib/*' and '#utilities/*') over a global wildcard path alias like '#/*'.
Prefer '#' as the prefix of path aliases.
Do not import story decorators in test fixtures.
Do not import module mocks in test fixtures.
Do not import stories in test fixtures.
Do not import tests in test fixtures.
